name: Epilectris 3D
description:
Developed by josele (github) and me (gitlab) for a videogame event.

Press F to start, and press it again for two players. Best played with joypads, but the keys for shared game are:

P1: WASD and K (rotate right), J (rotate left), L (hold), Q (place), E (power up)

P2: Directional arrows and X (rotate right), Z (rotate left), C (hold), spacebar (place), M (power up)

P for pausing and O for level? I have no idea what it does now, but it's probably a cheat button for leveling up, don't use it.

Best played on fullscreen!
